reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 70/98: TURKEY - EXTENSION OF POWERS OF THE CANADIAN TURKEY MARKETING AGENCY
reg_info.reg_name_text: TURKEY — EXTENSION OF POWERS OF THE CANADIAN TURKEY MARKETING AGENCY
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 70/98: TURKEY - EXTENSION OF POWERS OF THE CANADIAN TURKEY MARKETING AGENCY
reg_info.act_under: Farm Products Marketing Act   Loi sur la commercialisation des produits agricoles

content.content: 1. In this Regulation,  “turkey” means a turkey, any class of turkey or part of a turkey produced in Ontario. O. Reg. 70/98, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. In this Regulation,

“turkey” means a turkey, any class of turkey or part of a turkey produced in Ontario. O. Reg. 70/98, s. 1.

content.content: 2. The Canadian Turkey Marketing Agency is authorized to regulate the marketing within Ontario of turkey in the manner set out in section 3. O. Reg. 70/98, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. The Canadian Turkey Marketing Agency is authorized to regulate the marketing within Ontario of turkey in the manner set out in section 3. O. Reg. 70/98, s. 2.

content.content: 3. For the purpose of regulating the marketing of turkey within Ontario, the Canadian Turkey Marketing Agency may exercise, with respect to the turkey marketed, the powers that it may exercise with the respect to turkey marketed in interprovincial or export trade under clauses 22 (1) (d), (j), (k) and (m) of the Farm Products Agencies Act (Canada). O. Reg. 70/98, s. 3.
content.raw_html: 3. For the purpose of regulating the marketing of turkey within Ontario, the Canadian Turkey Marketing Agency may exercise, with respect to the turkey marketed, the powers that it may exercise with the respect to turkey marketed in interprovincial or export trade under clauses 22 (1) (d), (j), (k) and (m) of the Farm Products Agencies Act (Canada). O. Reg. 70/98, s. 3.
